mapper.insert: INSERT INTO Contract ( id, date, expiration_date, payment_date, termination_date, contract_status, customer_id, employee_id, product_id, lastpaid_date ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{date}, #{expiration_date}, #{payment_date}, #{termination_date}, #{contract_status}, #{customer_id}, #{employee_id}, #{product_id}, #{lastpaid_date} )
